<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<mx:TitleWindow xmlns:mx="http://www.adobe.com/2006/mxml" xmlns:effects="flex.effects.*"
    backgroundAlpha="0" cornerRadius="0" dropShadowEnabled="false" borderAlpha="0"
    borderThicknessBottom="2" borderThicknessLeft="2" borderThicknessRight="2" borderColor="#333333" backgroundColor="#888888"
    paddingTop="5" paddingBottom="5" paddingLeft="5" paddingRight="5">
    
    <mx:rollOver>
    this.showCloseButton = true;
    
    borderAlphaAnimation.playReversed = false;
    blurContentsAnimation.playReversed = false;
    borderAlphaAnimation.play();
    blurContentsAnimation.play();
    </mx:rollOver>
    
    <mx:rollOut>
    this.showCloseButton = false;
    
    if (borderAlphaAnimation.elapsedTime >= borderAlphaAnimation.duration)
    {
        borderAlphaAnimation.playReversed = true;
        blurContentsAnimation.playReversed = true;
        borderAlphaAnimation.play();
        blurContentsAnimation.play();        
    }
    else
    {
        borderAlphaAnimation.reverse();
        blurContentsAnimation.reverse();
    }
    </mx:rollOut>
    
    <mx:Script>
    import mx.utils.ObjectUtil;
    import flex.events.AnimationEvent;

    private function updateAlpha(event:AnimationEvent):void
    {
        this.setStyle("borderAlpha", event.value);
        this.setStyle("backgroundAlpha", event.value);
    }
    
    private function updateBlur(event:AnimationEvent):void
    {
        for each (var c:DisplayObject in this.getChildren())
        {
            //c.filters = [new BlurFilter((event.value as Number), (event.value as Number))];
        }
    }
    </mx:Script>
    
    <effects:Animation id="borderAlphaAnimation" startValue="0" endValue="0.5" duration="650">
        <effects:activate>
            event.target.addEventListener("animationUpdate", updateAlpha);
        </effects:activate>
    </effects:Animation>

    <effects:Animation id="blurContentsAnimation" startValue="0" endValue="4" duration="650">
        <effects:activate>
            event.target.addEventListener("animationUpdate", updateBlur);
        </effects:activate>
    </effects:Animation>
    
</mx:TitleWindow>
